title: CSV Parser
description: Parse CSV (Comma-Separated Values) files, a simple tabular data format widely used for data exchange between spreadsheets, databases, and applications.

motivation.why: CSV is one of the most common formats for tabular data exchange. It's human-readable, supported by all spreadsheet applications, and ideal for bulk data import/export operations.

inputFormat.description: CSV files contain rows of comma-separated values. The first row typically contains headers. Values may be quoted to include commas or newlines.

examples.description: Simple CSV with headers and data rows

outputFormat.description: The parser returns a CsvData struct containing headers and rows, where each row is a vector of string values.

headers.description: Vec<String> - column names from first row

rows.description: Vec<CsvRow> where CsvRow contains Vec<String> of field values
